Eddie Eckstein (amụrụ na 29 Nọvemba 1939) bụ onye egwu a mụrụ na South Africa, onye na-eme ihe ọchị, ihe nkiri, telivishọn na onye na-eme ihe nkiri ma bụrụ onye a maara nke ọma maka arụmọrụ ya na otu egwu The Bats
Ọrụ ya, nke malitere na 1960s, gafere afọ iri ise.
A mụrụ Eddie Eckstein na Bezuidenhout Valley, Johannesburg na 29 Nọvemba 1939
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Marist Brothers College na mpaghara Observatory ma mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya ọ chọrọ ohere ịrụ ọrụ na Barclays Bank.
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ehihie na ụlọ akụ ahụ, a na-ewere abalị ya dị ka onye na-akụ igba na onye na-agụ egwú

Ọ ga-abụ onye otu ọtụtụ ndị otu South Africa na mmalite afọ iri isii dịka Al Willox Quartet, Flippie van Vuuren Band na Jimmie Rayson Combo. Mgbe ọ nụsịrị The Beatles na Bulawayo, Rhodesia, ọ ghọtara na ụdị egwu ọhụrụ a bụ ọdịnihu nke egwu ma mgbe ọ laghachiri Johannesburg, ọ zutere Paul Ditchfield wee guzobe otu egwu The Bats na 1964. Otu egwu mbụ nke otu ahụ, "All I Got", gara na nọmba 1 na Springbok Radio na LM Radio. Eckstein ga-emekwa ihe Paul Ditchfield dere na 1972 Tokyo Song Competition na abụ ahụ, "Oh God It's Beautiful", na-eru na ngwụcha asọmpi ahụ.  Bats kewara na 1981 ma ndị otu ahụ na-achụso ọrụ nke ha, mana ha gbanwere na 2000. Na ngwụcha afọ iri asaa, ọ ga-achịkwa otu ụmụ nwanyị niile dị na Johannesburg, Pantha, nke onye na-agụ egwú ya bụ PJ Powers.
N'afọ 2014, Eckstein sonyere na egwu egwu ya na ndị ọzọ a ma ama dịka Bobby Angel na Billy Forrest kpọrọ The Two Cowboys, na-ekpuchi egwu South Africa ihe karịrị afọ iri anọ ma na-egosi mba, rock, pop, duets na comedy.

Mgbe telivishọn malitere na South Africa na 1976, ihe ngosi na-atọ ọchị gosiri na South African Broadcasting Corporation (SABC) nke a na-akpọ Biltong & Potroast nke na-eme ka ndị na-eme ihe ọchị a mụrụ na South Africa megide ibe ha maka ihe enyere maka njakịrị kachasị mma
Ihe ngosi ahụ ga-aga afọ ise na telivishọn

Eckstein gosipụtara na mbipụta dị ka ihe nkiri na 2010 nke ga-egosipụta anọ n'ime ndị ama ama mbụ. Ọ ga-esokwa Clive Scott na Annabel Linder mee ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị n'ezinụlọ South Africa Oh George na 1981. Ọ bụ onye na-eme ememe na telivishọn Telly Fun Quiz na 1990s na onye isi ajụjụ Martin Bailie na SABC.

Ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri South Africa n'oge ogologo ọrụ ya nke gụnyere I Love My Wife, Little Shop of Horrors, Pyjama Tops, Not Now Darling, Grin and Bear It and What about Love. N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2012, a họpụtara Eckstein maka onyinye Audience Choice na Comics' Choice awards nke abụọ nke emere na Montecasino resort, na Johannesburg mana Sifiso Nene meriri ya.
